title: Emergency Remote Science Education: Effective Learning Experience Design through Task-Oriented Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting, requiring clear task design and feedback systems for learners with diverse digital competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental concepts in science with 80% or higher accuracy through task-oriented learning.
Learners complete the process of solving presented scientific problems using digital tools at least three times.
Learners revise and resubmit assignments at least twice based on feedback received from peers and instructors.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
